item.title: [HIVE-18516] load data should rename files consistent with insert statements for ACID Tables
item.description: load data should rename files consistent with insert statements for ACID Tables.
item.summary: load data should rename files consistent with insert statements for ACID Tables

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
